summary: Ths is JackoO\\\'s testing playground. If you want to test and feedback on my armor mods in progress, please do so!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=Orange][size=+5]JackoO\'s testing playground[/size][/color][/b][/font] [font=Palatino Linotype][b][size=+5][/size][/b][/font] 

[b][color=orange][size=+3]Read the description before download![/size][/color][/b]

[b][color=Red]Current version 0.1 (Sep 28, 2013)[/color][/b]


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Description[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
hey guys,

this is my testing playground. I will upload my yet unfinished business here - exclusively on the nexus - for you to test and give me feedback how to improve my mods. 
The uploaded mods will - for now - be unfinished armor mods only. 

Although this is public to any user of nexus - and everyone is invited to download my files - i ask you to follow some rules when downloading these:


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Rules[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------


__________[b][color=Crimson][size=+1][font=Palatino Linotype] 1. If you download one of my mods please give me feedback (as detailed as possible) in the discussion thread of the respective mod. [/color][/size][/font][/b]

__________[b][color=Gold][size=+1][font=Palatino Linotype] 2. Please give appropriate feedback on the mod! That includes technical and/or feedback on the design. I am not modding to see people giving me the feedback \\\"i don\\\'t like it\\\" - thats neither constructive nor does it motivate us modders to continuing with publishing mods. [/color][/size][/font][/b]

__________[b][color=Crimson][size=+1][font=Palatino Linotype] 3. If you have ideas for the later game implementation (e.g. a little quest mod) please post your ideas in the respective mod thread. If you want to help me by building up such a quest, you are more than welcome. [/color][/size][/font][/b]

__________[b][color=Gold][size=+1][font=Palatino Linotype] 4. Do not reupload any of the content of these WIP mod files - in any case. Due to the fact that I intend to upload my own work firstly by myself, i think this would be a fair deal. [/color][/size][/font][/b]

__________[b][color=Crimson][size=+1][font=Palatino Linotype] 5. If you like and want to appreciate my work - please endorse. Even if this work is yet unfinished, it took a lot of effort to make. And its free for you! [/color][/size][/font][/b]



As for my work: I will continue working on the mod that has the most downloads in the first 4 weeks. (as indicator of the mod that you most probably want to see repolished and finished. 
 

How to find the stuff: All armors will be stored in a chest in Riverwood\\\'s Inn beside the bar!
 

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Changelog[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------

Changes:

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Current Content:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
this mod includes:
X

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Installation:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
(if you have installed a previous version - uninstall it first!)


Copy the the files into your data folder in your personal skyrim game folder.
Start the skyrim launcher, check the oOsSkyrimKnightlyArmory.esp and start game

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Uninstall:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
uncheck JoOtestingplayground____.esp in skyrim launcher
delete the .esp file and the following:


remove the JoOtestingplayground1.bsa in your skyrim/data folder
remove all JoOtestingplayground____.esp files



[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Credits: [/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
--------------------
Thanks to Bethesda for creating skyrim and the Creation kit!
Thanks to cgtextures.com
\\\"One or more textures on this 3D-model have been created with images from CGTextures.com. These images may not be redistributed by default. Please visit www.cgtextures.com for more information\\\"
Thanks to skyrimnexus
Thanks to all creators of blender
Thanks to all creators of niftools


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Licensing:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
Do not - in any case - reupload content of the mods uploaded here.

For all objects modified with base skyrim resources: all rights reserved to bethesda softworks
author: JackoO
